events.name: Battery Supply Chain
events.wd_description: The demand for electric vehicles is increasing worldwide, leading to a high demand for lithium-ion batteries, whose supply chains are associated with high environmental and socio-economic impacts.
events.description: The demand for electric vehicles is increasing worldwide, leading to a high demand for lithium-ion batteries, whose supply chains are associated with high environmental and socio-economic impacts.

events.name: EU Battery Regulation
events.wd_description: Legal regulations force battery manufacturers to use secondary materials, comply with CO2-limits and ensure social conditions along their supply chains.
events.description: Legal regulations force battery manufacturers to use secondary materials, comply with CO2-limits and ensure social conditions along their supply chains.

events.name: Secondary Materials
events.wd_description: Battery manufacturers are forced to use secondary materials.
events.description: Battery manufacturers are forced to use secondary materials.

events.name: Optimization Models
events.wd_description: The results of the life cycle sustainability assessment approach often lead to conflicting goals between and within sustainability dimensions, making it challenging to derive recommendations for more sustainable battery supply chain designs.
events.description: The results of the life cycle sustainability assessment approach often lead to conflicting goals between and within sustainability dimensions, making it challenging to derive recommendations for more sustainable battery supply chain designs.

events.name: Decision Support Model
events.wd_description: Optimization models are used to derive recommendations for more sustainable battery supply chain designs.
events.description: Optimization models are used to derive recommendations for more sustainable battery supply chain designs.

events.name: Spatial Analysis
events.wd_description: Spatial analysis is used to analyze the impact of different scenarios on the environment.
events.description: Spatial analysis is used to analyze the impact of different scenarios on the environment.

events.name: Cost-Benefit Analysis
events.wd_description: Cost-benefit analysis is used to evaluate the economic feasibility of different scenarios.
events.description: Cost-benefit analysis is used to evaluate the economic feasibility of different scenarios.

events.name: Optimization models for sustainable battery supply chains
events.wd_label: Optimization models for sustainable battery supply chains
events.wd_description: Optimization models that take into account the three sustainability dimensions can help derive recommendations for more sustainable battery supply chain designs. This study combines life cycle sustainability assessment results with a decision support model.
events.description: Optimization models that take into account the three sustainability dimensions can help derive recommendations for more sustainable battery supply chain designs. This study combines life cycle sustainability assessment results with a decision support model.

events.name: Optimization models
events.wd_description: Optimization models are used to derive recommendations for more sustainable battery supply chain designs.
events.description: Optimization models are used to derive recommendations for more sustainable battery supply chain designs.

events.name: Decision support model
events.wd_description: The study combines life cycle sustainability assessment results with a decision support model to derive actionable recommendations.
events.description: The study combines life cycle sustainability assessment results with a decision support model to derive actionable recommendations.

events.name: Sustainability dimensions
events.wd_description: The optimization models consider environmental, economic, and social dimensions of sustainability.
events.description: The optimization models consider environmental, economic, and social dimensions of sustainability.
